SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.aionemu.gameserver.dataholders.loadingutils
Class XmlMerger

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.dataholders.loadingutils.XmlMerger

public class XmlMerger
extends java.lang.Object

XmlMerger is a utility that writes XML document onto an other document with resolving all import elements.

Schema: 

 <xs:element name="import">
 <xs:annotation>
 <xs:documentation><![CDATA[
      Attributes:
          'file' :
              Required attribute.
              Specified path to imported file or directory.
          'skipRoot' :
              Optional attribute.
              Default value: 'false'.
              If enabled, then root tags of imported files are ignored.
          'recirsiveImport':
              Optional attribute.
              Default value: 'true'.
              If enabled and attribute 'file' points to the directory, then all xml files in that
              directory ( and deeper - recursively ) will be imported, otherwise only files inside
              that directory (without it subdirectories)
  ]]></xs:documentation>
 </xs:annotation>
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="file" use="required"/>
 <xs:attribute type="xs:boolean" name="skipRoot" use="optional" default="false"/>
 <xs:attribute type="xs:boolean" name="recursiveImport" use="optional" default="true" />
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>

Created on: 23.07.2009 12:55:14

Author:
Aquanox

If this option is enabled you import the directory, and all its subdirectories. Default is 'true'.

Method Detail

process

public void process()
             throws java.lang.Exception
This method creates a result document if it is missing, or updates existing one if the source file has modification.
If there are no changes - nothing happens.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - when source file doesn't exists.
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - when XML processing error was occurred.
java.lang.Exception

checkFileModifications

private boolean checkFileModifications()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Check for modifications of included files.

Returns:
true if at least one of included files has modifications.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - IO Error.
org.xml.sax.SAXException - Document parsing error.
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if a SAX parser cannot be created which satisfies the requested configuration.
java.lang.Exception

doUpdate

private void doUpdate()
               throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException,
                      java.io.IOException
This method processes the source file, replacing all of the 'import' tags by the data from the relevant files.

Throws:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException - on event writing error.
java.io.IOException - if the destination file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason
